meanings.definition: A person who has seen something happen and can give a first-hand account of it.
meanings.sent1: The eyewitnesses described the accident to the police.
meanings.sent2: The eyewitnesses were called to testify in court.
meanings.sent3: The eyewitnesses at the party all agreed on what they saw.
meanings.sent4: The eyewitnesses' memories were like cameras capturing the event.
meanings.sent5: The eyewitnesses' testimonies were crucial in solving the mystery.
